Build a PC Wiki

.. Hint:: Work-In-Progress. 
   Information may be missing or outright wrong.

| Solid Builds Oct. 2014 | Price ($/€)   | PCPP link                                                    |
+========================+===============+==============================================================+
| Budget Intel w/o SSD   | 500€ ~ 550$   |  http://pcpartpicker.com/p/m4ftNG                            |
+------------------------+---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| Mid-range budget w/ SSD| 700€ ~ 800$   |  pc.pp/adasd                                                 |
+------------------------+---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| 60FPS 1080p AMD        |               |  pc.pp/asasd                                                 |
+------------------------+ 900€ ~ 1100$  +--------------------------------------------------------------+
| 60FPS 1080p NVIDIA     |               |  pc.pp/asdsd                                                 |
+------------------------+---------------+--------------------------------------------------------------+
| I want that 4k SLI     | 1300€ ~ 1500$ |  pc.pp/asdf                                                  |
|                        |               |                                                              |
